channel.title: Health ~n~ stairs help~
channel.description: ok so im making my server ancientscape have a huge monster tower i have barrows, jads, dragons, all o nthe first floor but im trying to firgure out how to make stairs work so that i may add the 2nd and 3rd floor and also every monster in the place i cant kill without my p ring on (-if u c my server advertisement know that i am the only one with p ring besides my bro-)

item.title: Health ~n~ stairs help~
item.dc:creator: @Devil_Cry Devil Cry
item.description:
@Devil_Cry wrote:

case object id here: // whatever u want here
if(playerLevel[number for lvl here ] >= lvl required ( 0 if u dont want )) { // whatever u want here
sendMessage("another random txt field ...");
teleportToX = coords x here;
teleportToY = coords y here;
heightLevel = hight lvl 1-3;
updateRequired = true; 
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else {
sendMessage("-------->What it says when u click the object...<-------");
}
break;

There lol

item.title: Health ~n~ stairs help~
item.dc:creator: @Devil_Cry Devil Cry
item.description:
@Devil_Cry wrote:

Edit this a bit, Case is the id number,

case 10529: // slayer chain 2 door if(playerLevel[18] >= 90) { // Devil Cry sendMessage("The door opens and lets the master slayer through.."); teleportToX = 3427; teleportToY = 3556; heightLevel = 1; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("The door bolts shut senceing there is a noob slayer around."); } break;
